review: I was pretty pleased with my first Amazon TV but I then purchased the "stick" thinking it would be minus those pesky wires. Yes, I was wrong but that was okay. However, the stick stinks because I have yet been able to watch a movie without constant buffering so I finally gave up and unplugged it and reconnected the original so I could actually watch a movie!  Pretty disappointing.
